description: How interested are you in politics
notes: All waves. W1-W2 (1=not at all to 4=very) HIGHER=MORE. W3-W6 (1=very to 4=not at all) HIGHER=LESS. Must reverse W1-W2

description: How often follow news about politics and government
notes: All waves but different scales. W1 (2=practically never to 6=everyday) 6-point. W2 (1=practically never to 5=everyday) 5-point HIGHER=MORE. W3-W6 (1=everyday to 5=practically never) HIGHER=LESS. Must reverse W1-W3

description: How often discuss political matters with family or friends
notes: Most waves. W1 (1=never to 5=very often) 5-point HIGHER=MORE. W2 (1=never to 3=frequently) 3-point HIGHER=MORE. W3-W6 (1=frequently to 3=never) HIGHER=LESS. Must reverse W1-W2. Different scale lengths require careful harmonization
